link_name: RealOpInsight - Zabbix Dashboard tool for federation and application operations monitoring
link_desc:
RealOpInsight is an open-source visualization and dashboard stack providing capabilities for federation and application operations monitoring over Zabbix.

Among others, RealOpInsight enables the following features:

  • Tactical dashboards for both operations staffs and executive people.
  • Federated & unified monitoring: allowing to collect and consolidate data from distributed Zabbix monitoring environments and provide to operations staffs unified application operations dashboards.
  • Monitoring of business values: by allowing you to focus on applications that underlie your business, to fire notifications at application-level, and easily generate availability reports over time.
  • Quick integration since based on Zabbix's API.
  • Full open source available on GitHub.

More features and details can be learnt from RealOpInsight website.
author: RealOpInsight Labs
